content:
#22503

Paul mentioned deriving the results in Data.Nat.Multiplicity using the new PR but that causes a large-imports tag. Any thoughts?
It does seem like it would be good to think a bit about how we organise the results about factorisation, yeah. Maybe @Yaël Dillies has it all worked out in their head already
My plan is to do the refactor the way I think it should go, get yelled at by the bot and subsequently fix the pre-existing bogus imports :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
